original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

translated: In the same way, the bodhisattva mahÄsattva enters all worlds as illusion, the world of karma, the world of afflictions, the world of realms, the world of phenomena, the world of time,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad la sgyu ma'i rnam par 'jug pas sems can rnams skye bar mi byed do //

original: zhing rnams skye bar mi byed do //
analyzed: zhing rnams skye bar mi byed do //

original: 'jig par mi byed do //
analyzed: 'jig par mi byed do //

analyzed: 'das pa la rnam par mi rtog go / ma 'ongs pa la mngon par 'du mi byed do //

original: byang chub la spyod pa med do //
analyzed: byang chub la spyod pa med do //

original: byang chub la yongs su rtogs pa med do //
analyzed: byang chub la yongs su rtogs pa med do //

analyzed: sangs rgyas 'byung bar mi byed do //

original: sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi byed do //

analyzed: skyon med pa la chags par mi byed do //

original: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: phyogs thams cad la rmongs pa med pa khong du chud par byed pa dang / stobs thams cad tha mi dad par sgrub pa dang / yon tan thams cad yul mtha' yas par yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas rab tu thob par byed pa dang /

translated: the realization of the non-delusion of all directions, the accomplishment of the non-differentiation of all powers, the perfection of all qualities in the infinite realm, the attainment of the source of all phenomena,

original: dpag tu med pa thob par byed pa dang / rdo rje ltar brtan pa la rab tu gzhol ba dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag tshad med pa thams cad mngon par sgrub pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du phyin cing chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir ro //

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /

translated: Bodhisattva great beings who have this acceptanceğŸ”½attain a body that is free from going, in the manner of being free from going.ğŸ”½They attain a body that is free from arising, in the manner of being free from cessation.

original: 'jig pa med pa'i tshul du 'pho ba med pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: 'jig pa med pa'i tshul du 'pho ba med pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They attain a body that is free from transmigration, in the manner of being free from destruction.

original: ji ltar mthong ba ma yin pa'i tshul du bden pa med pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: ji ltar mthong ba ma yin pa'i tshul du bden pa med pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They attain a body that is not a reality, in the sense of not being seen as such.

original: mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul du mtshan nyid gcig pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul du mtshan nyid gcig pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They attain a body that is of one character, in the sense of being without character.

original: sangs rgyas kyi stobs tshad med pa'i tshul du tshad med pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi stobs tshad med pa'i tshul du tshad med pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They attain an immeasurable body, in the sense of the immeasurable power of the Buddhas.

original: de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshul du mnyam pa nyid kyi lus rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshul du mnyam pa nyid kyi lus rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They attain a body of sameness, in the sense of the character of suchness.

original: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid khong du chud cing bzod pa'i tshul du tha mi dad pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid khong du chud cing bzod pa'i tshul du tha mi dad pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They attain a body that is not differentiated, in the sense of the acceptance of the sameness of the three times.

original: mnyam pa nyid kyi mig rnam par dag pas bsgribs pa med pa'i tshul du thams cad du 'gro ba'i lus rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi mig rnam par dag pas bsgribs pa med pa'i tshul du thams cad du 'gro ba'i lus rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They attain a body that goes everywhere, in the sense of being unobstructed by the pure eye of sameness.

original: chos thams cad ldan pa dang mi ldan pa med pa'i tshul du 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha'i lus rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: chos thams cad ldan pa dang mi ldan pa med pa'i tshul du 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha'i lus rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They attain a body that is the end of desire, in the sense that all things are neither conjoined nor disjoined.

original: bsod nams zad mi shes pa'i tshul du nam mkha' ltar mtha' dang mu med pa rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: bsod nams zad mi shes pa'i tshul du nam mkha' ltar mtha' dang mu med pa rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They attain the inexhaustible merit of space, which is limitless like space.

original: chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid gcig pa'i tshul du chos nyid mnyam pa nyid @361b thob pas zad mi shes shing thogs pa med pa rab tu 'thob bo //

translated: They attain the inexhaustible and unobstructed state of equality of all phenomena, which are of one characteristic in the nature of space.

original: nam mkha' ltar thogs pa med pa'i tshul du dbyangs mtha' yas shing tshad med pa rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: nam mkha' ltar thogs pa med pa'i tshul du dbyangs mtha' yas shing tshad med pa rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They attain the infinite and boundless melody of the voice, which is unobstructed like space.

original: nam mkha' ltar thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs shing rnam par dag pa rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: nam mkha' ltar thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs shing rnam par dag pa rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They attain the complete and pure skill in all bodhisattva conduct, which is unobstructed like space.

original: nam mkha' ltar rgyun chad pa med pa'i tshul du sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa tshad med pa thams cad rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: nam mkha' ltar rgyun chad pa med pa'i tshul du sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa tshad med pa thams cad rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They attain the inexhaustible ocean of the lineage of the buddhas, which is uninterrupted like space.

original: nam mkha' ltar tshad med cing mthar thug pa med pa'i tshul du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad tshad med pa'i zhing du byin gyis rlob pa rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: nam mkha' ltar tshad med cing mthar thug pa med pa'i tshul du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad tshad med pa'i zhing du byin gyis rlob pa rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They attain the power to bless all buddha-fields as boundless fields, in the manner of space, without limit or end.

original: nam mkha' rgya mtsho'i tshul du chos thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgyun mi 'chad par yang dag par ston pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //

translated: They perfect the teaching of the uninterrupted magical emanations of all things, in the manner of the sky and the ocean.

original: nam mkha' ltar 'jig rten thams cad 'dzin pa'i tshul du lus thams cad 'jig pa med cing shin tu brten pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' ltar 'jig rten thams cad 'dzin pa'i tshul du lus thams cad 'jig pa med cing shin tu brten pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: They perfect the indestructible, well-established body, in the manner of space, which holds all worlds.

original: 'jig rten gyi gdung ba thams cad kyis nam mkha' 'tshig par mi 'gyur ba'i tshul du rdo rje ltar sra zhing brtan la rno ba'i dbang po yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi gdung ba thams cad kyis nam mkha' 'tshig par mi 'gyur ba'i tshul du rdo rje ltar sra zhing brtan la rno ba'i dbang po yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: They perfect the vajra-like faculties, sharp, firm, and solid, in the manner of space, which is not burned by the fires that consume the world.

original: nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi tshul du 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'dzin pa'i stobs la yang dag par 'byung ngo //ğŸ”½kye; rgyal ba'i @362a *//

analyzed: mkhas pa'i ye shes @364a *//

analyzed: lam gyi bzhi mdor 'jig rten phal gyi nang bstan pa //

analyzed: sgyu mas 'jig rten las ni gang yang 'grub mi 'gyur //

original: de bzhin 'gro ba ji snyed gang rnams yod pa dag /
analyzed: de bzhin 'gro ba ji snyed gang rnams yod pa dag /
translated: In the same way, all the beings that there are

translated: Have the nature of illusion and are unborn.ğŸ”½Things exist and do not exist, and likewise they are and are not,

analyzed: dngos yod dngos med de bzhin yod dang med pa dang // skal pa mi mnyam tshul gyis gro rgyud rab tu ston //

analyzed: glang po rta dang ba lang phyugs dang shing rnams dang // me tog 'bras bu bzang dang ldan pa'i mtsho yang ston //

analyzed: 'jig @365a *// rten rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs mang po ston //

analyzed: de bzhin rgyal sras btsun pa rigs dang ldan pa rnams //

original: gnas par mi byed mngon par chags pa de bzhin med //
analyzed: gnas par mi byed mngon par chags pa de bzhin med //
translated: They do not dwell on them or become attached to them.

original: chags med mtha' yi sgyu ma'i tshul ni des shes so //
analyzed: chags med mtha' yi sgyu ma'i tshul ni des shes so //
translated: They know the way of illusory nonattachment.

original: de ltar rgyal sras mkhas pa rnams //
analyzed: de ltar rgyal sras mkhas pa rnams //
translated: Thus the wise bodhisattvas

original: rab tu zhi la dga' zhing spros pa med pa ste //
analyzed: rab tu zhi la dga' zhing spros pa med pa ste //
translated: Delight in peace, are free of conceptual elaboration,

original: gnas med sa dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: gnas med sa dang yang dag ldan //
translated: And are endowed with the stage that is without abode.

original: chos dbyings gnas la de dag rab tu zhugs //
analyzed: chos dbyings gnas la de dag rab tu zhugs //
translated: They have entered the abode of the realm of phenomena.

original: de na chos nyid rtogs pa ste //
analyzed: de na chos nyid rtogs pa ste //
translated: They have realized the nature of phenomena

original: brtan pa de dag rgyal ba'i sku skyes sras yin no //
analyzed: brtan pa de dag rgyal ba'i sku skyes sras yin no //
translated: And are the offspring of the Victorious Ones.

original: 'du shes rgyu la mkhas pa ste //
analyzed: 'du shes rgyu la mkhas pa ste //
translated: They are skilled in the causes of perception

original: 'gro ba thams cad 'du shes 'dra bar shes //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad 'du shes 'dra bar shes //
translated: And know that all beings are like perceptions.

original: smig rgyu'i 'du shes 'dra ba ste //
analyzed: smig rgyu'i 'du shes 'dra ba ste //
translated: They are like perceptions of a mirage

original: 'gro ba thams cad de ltar 'du shes phyin ci log /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad de ltar 'du shes phyin ci log /
translated: And know that all beings are deluded in that way.

original: 'du shes rnam phye mkhas pa ste //
analyzed: 'du shes rnam phye mkhas pa ste //
translated: They are skilled in the analysis of perceptions

original: de ni 'gro kun 'du shes spangs pa yin //
analyzed: de ni 'gro kun 'du shes spangs pa yin //
translated: And have eliminated all perceptions of beings.

original: sems can sna tshogs khong du chud //
analyzed: sems can sna tshogs khong du chud //
translated: And the various beings within it.

original: 'jig rten kun gyi sna tshogs rnam pa kun dang bral //
analyzed: 'jig rten kun gyi sna tshogs rnam pa kun dang bral //
translated: â€œThe world is free of all the various aspects.

original: 'jig rten 'du shes rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'du shes rab tu shes so //
translated: The world is known to be without conceptualization.

original: 'jig rten 'du shes med min 'du shes ldan //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'du shes med min 'du shes ldan //
translated: The world is not without conceptualization, but has conceptualization.

original: @365b phyogs rnams 'du shes 'dra ba ste //
analyzed: @365b phyogs rnams 'du shes 'dra ba ste //
translated: â€œThe world is like a conceptualization of directions.

original: sems can mtha' yas 'du shes rnam pa sna tshogs yin //
analyzed: sems can mtha' yas 'du shes rnam pa sna tshogs yin //
translated: The world has various conceptualizations of infinite beings.

original: ma nor mig dang ldan pa rnams //
analyzed: ma nor mig dang ldan pa rnams //
translated: Those who have the unerring eyeğŸ”½See the various conceptualizations of the world.

original: 'jig rten sna tshogs 'du shes rab tu mthong; ;'jig rten smig rgyu 'dra ba ste //
analyzed: 'jig rten sna tshogs 'du shes rab tu mthong; ;'jig rten smig rgyu 'dra ba ste //
translated: â€œThe world is like a mirage.

original: 'du shes sna tshogs rnam pas 'jig rten rnam par bkod //
analyzed: 'du shes sna tshogs rnam pas 'jig rten rnam par bkod //
translated: The world is arrayed with various conceptualizations.

original: 'jig rten 'du shes gnas pa ste //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'du shes gnas pa ste //
translated: The world is based on conceptualization.

original: de dag phyin ci log gsum rnam par spangs //
analyzed: de dag phyin ci log gsum rnam par spangs //
translated: They have abandoned the three errors.

original: ji ltar smig rgyu'i tshogs kyi rnams //
analyzed: ji ltar smig rgyu'i tshogs kyi rnams //
translated: â€œJust as in a mirage

original: 'gro ba rnams la chu yi rnam pa dmigs par snang //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams la chu yi rnam pa dmigs par snang //
translated: The world sees the appearance of water,

original: de la chu ni yod min yang //
analyzed: de la chu ni yod min yang //
translated: Although there is no water there,ğŸ”½The conceptualization of water is completely deceptive.

original: chu yi 'du shes rnam par rab tu bslu; ;de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad kyang /
analyzed: chu yi 'du shes rnam par rab tu bslu; ;de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad kyang /
translated: â€œIn the same way, the entire world

original: khams gsum lam rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas te //
analyzed: khams gsum lam rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas te //
translated: The paths of the three realms are of infinite varieties.

original: 'du shes rnam pa smig rgyu bzhin //
analyzed: 'du shes rnam pa smig rgyu bzhin //
translated: Concepts are like mirages.

original: chags med yid ldan spyod yul mtha' yas so //
analyzed: chags med yid ldan spyod yul mtha' yas so //
translated: Those with limitless scope have minds free of attachment.

original: 'du shes thams cad rnam par spangs //
analyzed: 'du shes thams cad rnam par spangs //
translated: They have abandoned all concepts.

original: chags med ye shes ldan zhing spros pa med pa rnams //ğŸ”½'gro ba 'du shes chags gyur pa //
analyzed: chags med ye shes ldan zhing spros pa med pa rnams // 'gro ba 'du shes chags gyur pa //
translated: Those with wisdom free of attachment, free of conceptual elaboration,ğŸ”½Explain to beings who are attached to concepts

original: 'du shes bslus las brten pa 'grel par byed //
analyzed: 'du shes bslus las brten pa 'grel par byed //
translated: That concepts are deceptive and to rely on them is a mistake.

original: nga rgyal rlom dang dregs pa spangs //
analyzed: nga rgyal rlom dang dregs pa spangs //
translated: They abandon pride, conceit, and arrogance.

original: 'du shes thams cad bsal cing 'jig rten 'dren pa byed //
analyzed: 'du shes thams cad bsal cing 'jig rten 'dren pa byed //
translated: They lead the world, having eliminated all concepts.

original: mi zad zad pa rtogs pa rnams //
analyzed: mi zad zad pa rtogs pa rnams //
translated: They realize the exhaustion of the inexhaustible.

original: bden pa zad mi shes kyi tshul 'di yin //
analyzed: bden pa zad mi shes kyi tshul 'di yin //
translated: This is the way of the inexhaustible truth.

original: 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad rmi lam lta bur khong du chud //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad rmi lam lta bur khong du chud //
translated: They understand that all these worlds are like dreams.

original: chos rnams thams cad rmi lam ngo bo nyid du rab tu rtogs //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad rmi lam ngo bo nyid du rab tu rtogs //
translated: They fully realize that all phenomena are by nature dreams.

original: rmi lam de dag @366a *//
analyzed: rmi lam de dag @366a *//
translated: Those dreams

original: yul la mi gnas phyogs la'ang mi gnas te //
analyzed: yul la mi gnas phyogs la'ang mi gnas te //
translated: Do not exist in any place or direction.

original: rmi lam lta bur 'jig rten rab tu zhi la de dag gzhol //
analyzed: rmi lam lta bur 'jig rten rab tu zhi la de dag gzhol //
translated: The world is pacified like a dream, and they are dedicated to that.

original: rmi lam rang bzhin mkhas shing rnam par rtog med chos dang ldan //
analyzed: rmi lam rang bzhin mkhas shing rnam par rtog med chos dang ldan //
translated: They are skilled in the nature of dreams and are endowed with the nonconceptual Dharma.

original: rmi lam rtogs pa'i yid ldan sems la 'gyur ba gang yang med //
analyzed: rmi lam rtogs pa'i yid ldan sems la 'gyur ba gang yang med //
translated: They have the understanding of dreams and their minds are unmoved.

original: 'jig rten kun tu rmi lam lta bur shin tu rgyu zhing spyod //
analyzed: 'jig rten kun tu rmi lam lta bur shin tu rgyu zhing spyod //
translated: They move through the world like a dream, and they act like that.

original: dus gsum ma lus thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'i tshul du rtogs //
analyzed: dus gsum ma lus thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'i tshul du rtogs //
translated: They understand that the three times are all like an illusion.

original: rmi lam shi 'phor 'gyur ba med cing skye ba de bzhin med //
analyzed: rmi lam shi 'phor 'gyur ba med cing skye ba de bzhin med //
translated: In a dream, there is no death, no transmigration, and no birth.

original: rmi lam phyogs rnams kun na yod pa ma yin med pa min //
analyzed: rmi lam phyogs rnams kun na yod pa ma yin med pa min //
translated: A dream does not exist in any direction, and it does not not exist.

original: khams gsum rmi lam lta bu 'di la rnam rtog med byas shing //
analyzed: khams gsum rmi lam lta bu 'di la rnam rtog med byas shing //
translated: They make the three realms like a dream, without conceptualization.

original: rmi lam shin tu rtogs mkhas de dag sems la bcings pa med //
analyzed: rmi lam shin tu rtogs mkhas de dag sems la bcings pa med //
translated: They are skilled in the understanding of dreams and their minds are unfettered.

original: 'gro ba rmi lam rang bzhin 'dra la de dag mi gnas te //
analyzed: 'gro ba rmi lam rang bzhin 'dra la de dag mi gnas te //
translated: Beings are like the nature of a dream, but they do not abide in that.

original: 'jig rten 'gro ba rnam par dben la de dag brten pa med //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'gro ba rnam par dben la de dag brten pa med //
translated: The world is empty of beings, and they are not dependent on that.

original: 'jig rten rnam la mi rtog de bzhin rnam pa rtog pa med //
analyzed: 'jig rten rnam la mi rtog de bzhin rnam pa rtog pa med //
translated: In the same way, the world is not conceptualized, but is conceptualized.ğŸ”½This is the level of acceptance of the wise who understand dreams.

original: rmi lam rtogs shing mkhas pa'i bzod pa'i sa ni 'di yin no; ;rmi lam 'gro ba rnams ni rnam pa sna tshogs du ma snang //
analyzed: rmi lam rtogs shing mkhas pa'i bzod pa'i sa ni 'di yin no; ;rmi lam 'gro ba rnams ni rnam pa sna tshogs du ma snang //
translated: In dreams, various kinds of beings appear,

original: tha dad rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du bye brag rnam pa mang //
analyzed: tha dad rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du bye brag rnam pa mang //
translated: With different forms and features.

original: de bzhin ye shes zla bas 'gro ba thams cad rnam par mthong //
analyzed: de bzhin ye shes zla bas 'gro ba thams cad rnam par mthong //
translated: In the same way, the moon of wisdom sees all beings.

original: rmi lam sgra dang 'dra bar de dag rnam par rtog pa med //
analyzed: rmi lam sgra dang 'dra bar de dag rnam par rtog pa med //
translated: Like sounds in a dream, they are not conceptualized.

original: rmi lam lta bu'i tshul gyis rnam pa brtan pas rab tu rtogs //
analyzed: rmi lam lta bu'i tshul gyis rnam pa brtan pas rab tu rtogs //
translated: They are realized by the firm ones through the method of dreams.

original: de dag rmi lam mtshan nyid rnam 'das @366b skal pa mnyam pa min //
analyzed: de dag rmi lam mtshan nyid rnam 'das @366b skal pa mnyam pa min //
translated: They transcend the characteristics of dreams, and are not the same.

original: rmi lam de dag gcig pa ma yin nam yang mang pa min //
analyzed: rmi lam de dag gcig pa ma yin nam yang mang pa min //
translated: Dreams are neither the same nor different.

original: rmi lam rnam bkod rnam par 'gro ba thams cad rab tu shes //
analyzed: rmi lam rnam bkod rnam par 'gro ba thams cad rab tu shes //
translated: Through the arrangement of dreams, all beings are known.

original: de dag sems can thams cad rmi lam 'dra ba'i chos can dang // zhing rnams thams cad rmi 'dra de bzhin chos rnams rmi 'dra kun //
analyzed: de dag sems can thams cad rmi lam 'dra ba'i chos can dang // zhing rnams thams cad rmi 'dra de bzhin chos rnams rmi 'dra kun //
translated: that all realms are like a dream, and all phenomena are like a dream.

original: ji ltar nyon mongs de bzhin rnam par byang ba rab tu shes //
analyzed: ji ltar nyon mongs de bzhin rnam par byang ba rab tu shes //
translated: They know that just as there are afflictions, there is also purification.

original: 'jig rten rmi 'dra de la rnam par rtog pa gang yang med //
analyzed: 'jig rten rmi 'dra de la rnam par rtog pa gang yang med //
translated: The world is like a dream, and there is no conceptualization in it.

original: rmi lam lta bu'i spyod pas yang dag grub par gyur pa rnams //
analyzed: rmi lam lta bu'i spyod pas yang dag grub par gyur pa rnams //
translated: Those who have attained accomplishment through conduct that is like a dream

original: rmi lam lta bu'i smon lam rnam pas gnas pa med pa dag /
analyzed: rmi lam lta bu'i smon lam rnam pas gnas pa med pa dag /
translated: dwell in the state of aspiration that is like a dream.

original: rmi lam lta bu'i chos rnams kun la gnas 'cha' mi byed de //
analyzed: rmi lam lta bu'i chos rnams kun la gnas 'cha' mi byed de //
translated: They do not dwell in any phenomena that are like a dream.

original: 'jig rten rmi lam 'dra la khyab par byed pa gang yang med //
analyzed: 'jig rten rmi lam 'dra la khyab par byed pa gang yang med //
translated: The world is like a dream, and there is no pervasiveness in it.

original: 'jig rten 'di dag rmi lam lta bur byung bar shes shing dag /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di dag rmi lam lta bur byung bar shes shing dag /
translated: They know that the world arises like a dream.

original: rmi lam tshul rtogs 'gro ba kun tu mi 'jigs chos dang ldan //
analyzed: rmi lam tshul rtogs 'gro ba kun tu mi 'jigs chos dang ldan //
translated: They are pure, and they have the Dharma that is fearless in all worlds.

original: rmi lam bzhin spyod ldan pas 'jig rten kun tu chud mi za //
analyzed: rmi lam bzhin spyod ldan pas 'jig rten kun tu chud mi za //
translated: Those who have conduct that is like a dream are not lost in the world.

original: ring thung kun kyang rmi lam brgyud bzhin de dag rab tu shes //
analyzed: ring thung kun kyang rmi lam brgyud bzhin de dag rab tu shes //
translated: And all the long and short, like a dream, they know well.

original: 'di ni rmi lam lta bu'i yid ldan rnams kyi bzod pa ste //
analyzed: 'di ni rmi lam lta bu'i yid ldan rnams kyi bzod pa ste //
translated: This is the patience of those who have a mind like a dream,

original: rmi lam lta bus 'jig rten sems can rab tu 'dren par byed //
analyzed: rmi lam lta bus 'jig rten sems can rab tu 'dren par byed //
translated: Who lead beings in the world like a dream.

original: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa rtogs byas chags med ye shes can //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa rtogs byas chags med ye shes can //
translated: They have the wisdom of being unattached to the thoughts of beings,

original: sems la bcings med 'gro ba khrag khrig yongs su 'grel ba byed //
analyzed: sems la bcings med 'gro ba khrag khrig yongs su 'grel ba byed //
translated: And they liberate billions of beings whose minds are unfettered.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa @367a *//
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa @367a *//
translated: â€œIn that way, the bodhisattvasâ€™

original: rgya che mtha' yas pa //
analyzed: rgya che mtha' yas pa //
translated: Conduct is vast and infinite.

original: chos rnams mngon rab bsgrub pa yangs pa khong du chud byed //
analyzed: chos rnams mngon rab bsgrub pa yangs pa khong du chud byed //
translated: They understand the vast accomplishment of the Dharma.ğŸ”½They understand the many ways of the nature of phenomena.

original: chos kyi chos nyid du ma'i tshul rnams khong du des chud; ;chos tshul rnam pa tha dad kun la chags pa'i sems med //ğŸ”½'gro kun dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam pa ji snyed yod pa //
analyzed: chos kyi chos nyid du ma'i tshul rnams khong du des chud; ;chos tshul rnam pa tha dad kun la chags pa'i sems med // 'gro kun dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam pa ji snyed yod pa //
translated: They have no attachment to the various ways of the Dharma.ğŸ”½â€œThey understand the various aspects of the voices of beings

original: de dag sgra dbyangs sgra snyan bzhin du khong du des chud //
analyzed: de dag sgra dbyangs sgra snyan bzhin du khong du des chud //
translated: To be like the pleasant sound of music.

original: sgrar brjod de dag nang na med par rab tu shes te //
analyzed: sgrar brjod de dag nang na med par rab tu shes te //
translated: They know that those sounds do not exist internally or externally.

original: sgra rnams thams cad phyi nang med par rab tu de shes //
analyzed: sgra rnams thams cad phyi nang med par rab tu de shes //
translated: They know that all sounds are without internal or external.

original: sgra brnyan ji ltar rnam pa sna tshogs sgra tshul grag ste //
analyzed: sgra brnyan ji ltar rnam pa sna tshogs sgra tshul grag ste //
translated: Just as an echo resounds in various ways,

original: rnam rtog dbyangs dang 'dra yang rnam rtog med pa'i sgra yin //
analyzed: rnam rtog dbyangs dang 'dra yang rnam rtog med pa'i sgra yin //
translated: Though it is a sound without conceptualization,

original: sgra rnams rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad de bzhin rab shes //
analyzed: sgra rnams rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad de bzhin rab shes //
translated: They know in that way all the various kinds of sounds.

original: sgra la mngon par chags med de bzhin rlom pa'i sems med //
analyzed: sgra la mngon par chags med de bzhin rlom pa'i sems med //
translated: They are not attached to sounds and do not think in that way.

original: sems can kun gyi gtso bo thams cad de mthong gyur cing //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi gtso bo thams cad de mthong gyur cing //
translated: They see the foremost being of all beings,

original: 'jig rten mgon po chos rnams gsung zhing dbyangs sgrog mdzad pas //
analyzed: 'jig rten mgon po chos rnams gsung zhing dbyangs sgrog mdzad pas //
translated: The lords of the world, teaching and proclaiming the Dharma.

original: mdo mang brjod du med pa rab tu gsung zhing ston kyang //
analyzed: mdo mang brjod du med pa rab tu gsung zhing ston kyang //
translated: Though they teach and explain many sÅ«tras,

original: rgyal ba'i gsung dbyangs de la de ni gnas par mi byed //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i gsung dbyangs de la de ni gnas par mi byed //
translated: They do not rest on the sound of the Jinaâ€™s voice.

original: sgra brnyan de dag ji ltar sgra yi rnam par grag kyang //
analyzed: sgra brnyan de dag ji ltar sgra yi rnam par grag kyang //
translated: Just as an echo resounds in various ways,

original: sgra brnyan rnam pa dag la sgra rnams gang yang yod min //
analyzed: sgra brnyan rnam pa dag la sgra rnams gang yang yod min //
translated: In the various aspects of echoes, there are no sounds at all.

original: de ltar dbyangs kyi bye brag rjes 'brang chos kyi rnam pa //
analyzed: de ltar dbyangs kyi bye brag rjes 'brang chos kyi rnam pa //
translated: In that way, the various aspects of sounds are the aspects of phenomena.

original: chos nyid 'jig med ldan pa rnam phye chos la rab mkhas //
analyzed: chos nyid 'jig med ldan pa rnam phye chos la rab mkhas //
translated: The phenomena that are endowed with the indestructible nature are distinguished and are well known as phenomena.

original: de dag sgra @367b dbyangs thams cad rnam par rab tu sgom ste /
analyzed: de dag sgra @367b dbyangs thams cad rnam par rab tu sgom ste /
translated: They meditate on all sounds and tones.

original: sgra rnams rnam par dbye la mkhas pas sgra rnams sel byed //
analyzed: sgra rnams rnam par dbye la mkhas pas sgra rnams sel byed //
translated: They are skilled in distinguishing sounds and eliminating sounds.

original: 'gro ba kun dbyangs dbyangs tshul min par rab tu shes te //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun dbyangs dbyangs tshul min par rab tu shes te //
translated: They know that the sounds of all beings are not sounds.

original: dbyangs kyi yan lag dag pa de dag dbyangs kun rab shes //
analyzed: dbyangs kyi yan lag dag pa de dag dbyangs kun rab shes //
translated: They know all sounds, knowing the purity of the aspects of sound.

original: chos rnams de dag kun la sgra med sgrar 'jug byed de //
analyzed: chos rnams de dag kun la sgra med sgrar 'jug byed de //
translated: All those phenomena are without sound, but they are engaged in sound.

original: brjod pa khrag khrig sna tshogs rnams kyi rjes su zhugs shing //ğŸ”½'gro ba thams cad sgra brnyan bzhin du mngon par ston byed //
analyzed: brjod pa khrag khrig sna tshogs rnams kyi rjes su zhugs shing // 'gro ba thams cad sgra brnyan bzhin du mngon par ston byed //
translated: They engage with the various quintillions of expressionsğŸ”½and demonstrate to beings that are like echoes.

original: 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi sgra yang de bzhin rab shes //
analyzed: 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi sgra yang de bzhin rab shes //
translated: They know the sounds of all beings in the same way.

original: de dag tshig tshul rjes su 'gro ba'i shes bya rtogs ldan //
analyzed: de dag tshig tshul rjes su 'gro ba'i shes bya rtogs ldan //
translated: They are skilled in knowing the objects of knowledge that accord with the ways of words.

original: 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad sgra brnyan yan lag 'drar shes //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad sgra brnyan yan lag 'drar shes //
translated: â€œThey know that all these worlds are like echoes and limbs,

original: dbyangs kyi rang bzhin rnam par dag pas khong du chud de //
analyzed: dbyangs kyi rang bzhin rnam par dag pas khong du chud de //
translated: And they understand that their nature is pure sound.

original: sgra yi mtshan nyid ji bzhin 'jig rten de bzhin shes so //
analyzed: sgra yi mtshan nyid ji bzhin 'jig rten de bzhin shes so //
translated: They know the world to be just like the characteristics of sound.

original: ji ltar sgra rnams chos rnams du ma rnam par ston byed //
analyzed: ji ltar sgra rnams chos rnams du ma rnam par ston byed //
translated: â€œJust as sounds manifest many phenomena,

original: sgra yi rnam rtog sna tshogs dbyangs kyi yan lag kun ldan //
analyzed: sgra yi rnam rtog sna tshogs dbyangs kyi yan lag kun ldan //
translated: The various concepts of sound are endowed with all the aspects of sound.

original: 'jig rten ma lus kun dbyangs mtshan nyid ci 'dra de bzhin //
analyzed: 'jig rten ma lus kun dbyangs mtshan nyid ci 'dra de bzhin //
translated: Just as all worlds have the characteristic of sound,

original: 'gro ba kun gyi mtshan nyid rgyal ba'i sras kyis rab shes //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun gyi mtshan nyid rgyal ba'i sras kyis rab shes //
translated: The bodhisattvas know the characteristics of all beings.

original: bzod pa 'di 'dra'i stobs kyis mkhas gyur dpa' bo de dag /
analyzed: bzod pa 'di 'dra'i stobs kyis mkhas gyur dpa' bo de dag /
translated: â€œThe wise heroes who have the power of such patienceğŸ”½Purify the world with various sounds,

original: sgra dbyangs sna tshogs 'jig rten kun tu yongs su sbyong ste; ;dus gsum shes pa'i blo dang ldan pas sgra yi tshul shes //
analyzed: sgra dbyangs sna tshogs 'jig rten kun tu yongs su sbyong ste; ;dus gsum shes pa'i blo dang ldan pas sgra yi tshul shes //
translated: And with the knowledge of the three times they know the way of sound.

original: 'on kyang rnam rtog gnas la de dag gnas mi 'cha'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang rnam rtog gnas la de dag gnas mi 'cha'o //
translated: But they do not settle down in the places where thoughts dwell.

original: zhi ba'i yid ldan 'di ltar byang chub brtson //
analyzed: zhi ba'i yid ldan 'di ltar byang chub brtson //
